name: Graveyard Keeper (itch)
description:
You play as the graveyard keeper and your mission is to bury the dead and keep the graves tidy. Failing to do your job in time will have dire consequenses!

Controls:

  • Keyboard
    • Movement: WASD or Arrows
    • Action: E, Space or Enter
  • Xbox360 controller
    • Movement: Left stick
    • Action: A
  • Mouse
    • Movement: Left click
    • Action: Left click

Graveyard Keeper was made in 2 days during Oulu Game Lab (OGL) Game Jam.

Team:

  • Programming: Risto Ihalainen, Justus Pousi
  • Graphics: Sampo Jumisko, Ari Lehtiniemi
  • Audio: Anna Haaraoja
